key: What OSC post is MadMapper configured on?
In Companion, add a Generic OSC instance
Configure the Generic OSC instance with IP and port
In MadMapper, either open the panel "Control List" and add via + and context menu the target property
In MadMapper, alternatively right click a property to copy OSC adress
In Companion, add a regular button with the action OSC Send Integer or OSC Send String or OSC Send Float or similar

key: Is the Zoom username defined and unikely to change?
In the Zoom App, is under Settings > Video near Camera the HD checkbox ticked?
In the Zoom App, is under Settings > Audio the appropriate Suppress background noise set?
In the Dress Rehearsal, can Original Sound be set to On?
Is the loudness meter visible to the participant?
Can the participant be pinned manually?
Can the participant be pinned by e.g. ZoomOSC?
What is the participant's Zoom name?
Can the participant be scraped from a (virtual) monitor with Zoom in fullscreen?
Will the participant be fed into OBS with a Window Capture?
Does the recording software also function as a communication software?
What is the Default Device for Recording?
What is the Default Device for Playback?
What is the Default Communication Device for Recording?
What is the Default Communication Device for Playback?
If an audio interface is used, does it have a monitoring output?
If an audio interface is used, which driver type is used?
If an audio interface is used, does it come with a Bitfocus Companion module?
If an external microphone is used, what is its transducer type?
If an external microphone is used, what cable does it have?
If an external microphone is used, does it need phantom power?
If an external microphone is used, what is its polar pattern?
If an external microphone is used, what is its frequency response?
If an external microphone is used, how is it adressed?
The Sound Settings of the Default Device for Recording has which level set?
The Sound Settings of the Default Device for Recording show which sample rate?
The Sound Settings of the Default Device for Recording show which setting for exclusive mode?
The Sound Settings of each Device for Recording has which level set?
The Sound Settings of the Default Device for Recording show which sample rate?
The Sound Settings of the Default Device for Recording show which setting for exclusive mode?
In the Volume Mixer, which output levels are set?
In the "App volume and device preferences", which App Volume levels are set for Output?
In the "App volume and device preferences", which App Volume levels are set for Input?
In the recording software, which input device is set?
Is something plugged into headphone/speaker/microphone jack(s)?
In the Sound Settings Sounds panel, which sound scheme is set?
In the Sound Settings Communications panel, which audio ducking/volume control is set?
If a Realtek chipset is built in, are in Realtek HD Audio Manager for the Microphone device Microphone Effects Disabled?
In Settings > Privacy > Background Apps, are any apps switched off that might interfere with audio recording?
In Control Panel > Hardware > Power Options, is High Performance Setting set?
